name: Satanic
lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

descriptions.name: Unholy Rage
descriptions.description: Increases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 4.5 seconds.

descriptions.name: Lifesteal
descriptions.description: Heals the attacker for 25% of attack damage dealt. Satanic is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
